subject: I just want to say...
author: mrscaptainjack2
full_text:
In response to Frank's last statement, I just want to say I sincerely hope my posts aren't the ones upsetting you.  If they are, please tell me.  The last thing I would want is to cause frustration and bad feelings, and if my posts are a source of these things, I'd rather stop posting than upset anyone.  I'm here to learn, and I can certainly do that without contributing to the conversation.

Jill
